website_summaries.verdict: For sheer typing responsiveness, the Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard Cover for iPad Air is still a pro. But, even with its new tilt-angle design, it's no longer quite as unique as it used to be.
pros: The newest Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard Cover adds flexible angle adjustment and a row of dedicated iOS shortcut keys, but keeps the same great typing experience and key layout
cons: Overly plastic design on some parts makes this latest version of Logitech's keyboard accessory feel a little more flimsy

customer_reviews.title: FIts the new 2017 iPad perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the new 2017 iPad and it has the same Chassis as the original iPad Air. Just want to let everyone know that this does fit the new 2017 iPad perfectly. Fits in the little trench can fully tilt and everything the clamp fits snug the iPad and it's a solid close. So if you're curious about it fitting the new iPad, it does. Highly suggest for a keyboard on the go for your new iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken and Won't Hold Charge
customer_reviews.text: I entirely regret this purchase. This was meant to fit my Ipad 5th gen. It doesn't. I'm not sure if when intact it would but the the magnetic piece that should hold it onto ipad was completely broken off already when I opened the box. My other magnetic keyboard holds its charge for days. This one, not even for 24 hours. I bought this "refurbished" keyboard because I can no longer find the other clip-on magnetic bluetooth keyboard that I have always used, new or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Fits new IPad.
customer_reviews.text: So I have an IPad 9.7, the new 2017 release. I have both models of this iPad Air keyboard, and both fit my iPad just fine. My issue with this one is the "hinge." It's like. Plastic. I understand it might be sturdier than the original Smart Cover like magnet. But it just looks fragile to me. I love the function keys though, and I love the rubber bumps that keep the iPad from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Information From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when you order this item. What some of Amazon's partners are delivering is Logitech part 920-005510 not part 920-006215 as advertised on Amazon's page. Part 920-005510 is an earlier version of this keyboard/cover that lacks the hinge that changes the iPad viewing angle and is generally less sturdy due to lack of the plastic ridge that protects the keyboard and separates the keyboard from the iPad. Also, being a discontinued part that is 3 years older, you should also be concerned about the battery. It may be depleted or may not function properly due to disuse. Grand O's is one of the partners working with Amazon to sell the old stock part.
customer_reviews.author: William Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Magnetic Keyboard for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. No documentation in the box, but all I did was flick the power switch on the keyboard, set Bluetooth on the iPad to look for devices and they paired up. Magnetic catch for closing the keyboard with the iPad is slick design. I had previously used a Logitech folio sans keyboard to protect my iPad so was a little nervous that there is no back protection. I paired this combo with an Ncase sleeve for travel. Only negative I have is that sometimes I forget that the iPad is simply sitting in a notch on the keyboard and if I move too aggressively the iPad can fall out of the keyboard. Otherwise, perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: nljam23

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 and returned both because the first one's plastic piece that holds the ipad broke. Both the first and second unit did not secure the ipad in place and a few times the device fell out. Also, the magnet wasn't strong enough to hold the ipad in place. This model is highly rated and I am disappointed it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy L. Chirafisi

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard works very well and holds up for a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, I have owned it for a few years and it has held up very well. It was at a great price point and I don’t feel I have sacrificed anything due to the price. This keyboard performs like it is a hundred dollar keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Hames

customer_reviews.title: I just don't like it...
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the changes they made in this one for the new iPad... the magnetic "pop-up" section is awful! It rarely works the way it is supposed to. It is easier to carry them as two separate pieces than to go through the pain of lining everything up perfectly and it not work... also the tilt adjusts, but it is already so reclined back that I cannot think of a situation that the ipad would need to be tilted back that far! Unless you sit it in the floor and you are in a bunk bed, you are unlikely to use the tilt feature...
customer_reviews.author: Icthyus

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Ultrathin Magnetic Clip-on Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Logitech Keyboard I wasn't sure if I would like the keyboard. I do. I love it. I did find that the directions for setting up were not specific enough for me so I Googled it for video setup and pictures and how to charge it. Everything works great. It is light and easy. I thought I would be unhappy without the mouse in the center.To my surprise I don't miss it. I received it in two days. Great product, price and service.
customer_reviews.author: 31Vickyslady

customer_reviews.title: I had a keyboard case similar to this for my ipad 2 that was well designed and worked like a charm the whole time I had the ipad
customer_reviews.text: The Magnetic clip that the ipad connects to is awkward and is flimsy. I had a keyboard case similar to this for my ipad 2 that was well designed and worked like a charm the whole time I had the ipad 2. This new design is horrible. Plus just yesterday I broke off the flimsy magnetic holder for this and no it is not a secure case and is basically worthless. I would not recommend buying this at all!
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover and keypad
customer_reviews.text: Makes my iPad into a mini-laptop and protects the screen. This is the second one I’ve had - the last one was on my older iPad - and I wouldn’t go without one.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday. Love it! Pro: Looks great, matches iPad Air silver color perfectly. Very light too. Can adjust viewing angle, nice! Con: the slot holding iPad Air in landscape mode doesn't seems providing limited back support. When I use finger to touch/push the iPad screen, I'm afraid it may break or tilt over if I push hard. It's a well designed quality product. Will know after a couple of years. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but this time I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Logitech Ultrathin keyboard and the others have been fine. I'm disappointed that only 2 months after purchase, I can't count on the Blutooth connection working. The iPad shows a connection, but the keyboard just won't work sometimes. Still waiting for Logitech to decide if they will give me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic unit
customer_reviews.text: This blue tooth keyboard is a perfect match for my ipad. I have tried other keyboards and this is by fat the best, most responsive, and good looking unit that I have used. There is no hesitation, lag or key skips that I have experienced with the competition. I recommend this unit highly to anyone that might be interested in a slick, light, well balanced, magnetic clip, durable keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Still making up my mind
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost six months, still on the fence. The first trip I used it on, it worked great. My second trip, I had to leave it plugged in for it to work right. I do like that you can adjust the viewing angle. The way the magnet works is a little wonky. The keys are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it for a short time but I liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: This. Is a product that works exactly as advrtized!!!! I've only had it for a short time but I liked it very much!! For the price it is definitely worth it! I see myself not using my laptop very often anymore!. This is light and easy to type on. I do not abuse my things so I am not worried about protection as much as functionality! Thank you Logitech!!!!! Keep on making great products and I'll keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: 3 Months and it has stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June of this year, it now will not charge or even turn on. Tried to find the "contact seller" button but can not find it. We have now gone through 4 of these keyboards in the last 3 years, you'd think we'd learn
customer_reviews.author: MackLFuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard for an iPad
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for a highly rated keyboard/iPad cover. The Blue Tooth connection is flawless, the angle of the screen is adjustable, and a magnet holds the keyboard to the face of the iPad when closed. The keyboard is smaller than standard, of course, but it has a nice keyboard with a good feel. We have one for our iPad 2 and iPad mini and love them. They come with a charger, but honestly seem t work forever before they need recharging (USB).
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this keyboard for 4 months and it broke. The slot where you place the ipad had lifted and it’s stopped working. Not happy. This should last much much longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: A pricey iPad stand
customer_reviews.text: It's a very expensive ipad stand at this point. Runs out of juice quickly, has a separate charging cord for the keyboard which is a pain (already lost it) and it doesn't click or hold together when you "close" the iPad... kind of pointless. Wish I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: happybeingcrafty

customer_reviews.title: It is superior quality compared to some of the more modest priced ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 80 year old mother. The keyboard is smaller than a standard keyboard but works seamlessly. It is superior quality compared to some of the more modest priced products. The iPad fits securely and tilts back for easy viewing. My only complaint is that it doesn't come with how to instructions. These were easily accessed on-line however, for a new to technology older person, having a short booklet with basic features would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Functional! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice option for writing on my iPad. It set up easily and has kept my screen protected. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Wong

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: The most awesome accessory for my Ipad. I purchase two. This thing makes it look like a tiny laptop. I have only needed to charge is twice this school year. Everyone who sees it is amazed. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Purchase for iPad users
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought an iPad as a gift, and thus bought this keyboard to help make typing easier and also protect the device at the same time. As a protective device - not recommended. But it is a very nice keyboard. The magnetic strip makes it easy to open and close, and the keyboard has a nice feel when using it.
customer_reviews.author: J Maeda

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for iPad
customer_reviews.text: How can anyone use an iPad without this keyboard!? I LOVE it because it stands up at a good angle; it allows me to type super-fast which I simply cannot do on a touch screen. Perfect for holding on your lap in the car, on a plane or on the couch. Also makes it easy to set up a slide show or share something online with someone else. Snaps shut for easy storage. One charge lasts a very long time. No downside. It's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Artist Deb

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great design and quality.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: I love the keyboard and the fact that you can remove easily when you don't need it. The keys respond easily to the touch. You can tilt back the screen to different angles. It's sturdy and looks great with my ipad, like they were made together. Great quality! CONS: When you detach the keyboard you have two pieces to carry, but I prefer that than having a folded keyboard in the back of my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: ArgenTexan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard. There were lots of concerns about reliability ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. There were lots of concerns about reliability in other user's comments. And it is true that my previous version of the keyboard eventually cracked and broke - so I don't expect that this one will last more than 1-2 years. But aside from the potential reliability issues, it does everything right, feels great, exactly matches the IPAD, etc. I can't function without it. Plus, the price is now less than half what I bought the previous version for (from Best Buy).
customer_reviews.author: ritajohncarroll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard replacement for the iPad2.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy reliable replacement keyboard for the iPad2. It functions beautifully. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that for some people it will be a little heavy, and also the multiple tablet positions do not always find a perfect center of gravity for lap work, but net net I've been extremely pleased and grateful to Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha's Mom

customer_reviews.title: the keyboard looks so good, and also it easy
customer_reviews.text: it takes so long time to my hand. it takes many days to shipped after i ordered this stuff. but when i received it, i just ignored those unhappy mood. the keyboard looks so good, and also it easy, convinent for me to use it. even though it good enough in macro-look, there are still some bug. the first is, if i type faster, the writing screen will skip to home page, or just does function as screen shot button. it makes me so confusion what is going on the keyboard. the second is, there is no Micro-USB charging cable in the box, and also the box looks so dirty and not new.
customer_reviews.author: ruihua lin

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech keyboard make using the Apple device faster and even more easy to use. I can't imagine using an iPad without it. Also, the product I first ordered arrived with a manufacturers defect, and the seller (DealsDealt) was great in helping me replace the item. The product is awesome, and the seller gets two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: MiamiBeachDrew

customer_reviews.title: Light and Minimalist keyboard for iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is about as light and minimalist as possible. Unlike others, I like how the keys feel. The magnets that hold the iPad Air 2 in place and for storage are very strong. I don't feel like its going to fall out. The pads should help to keep the corners from scratching the surface, but you just need to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Reefer

customer_reviews.title: Slim and durable - i like it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this about 3 weeks ago and so far I am loving it. I was able to connect it right out of the box very easily and everything works perfectly. The magnetic latches very well and stays in place while in use. I love how it also doubles as a cover. It's super thin and durable. I only use this when I need the convenience of a keyboard, otherwise I use a difference case/stand to watch videos.
customer_reviews.author: Lis_p5

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: I got this keyboard for my iPad Air to use at school to make it easier to take notes, as well as leave my laptop at home and carry a smaller device. They keyboard works great! Only thing I noticed is that my left "Shift" key is a little faulty sometimes, feels like maybe something is underneath it so I have to press a bit harder. But overall its a great keyboard to have and at a pretty cheap price compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deadlines aren't an issue with this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. Poor girl used to type her papers on the touch screen. The keyboard attaches pretty strong with its magnets and take a beating well (I accidently stepped on it, she dropped it outside and still works perfectly). Typing on it very similar to typing on a MacBook Air, gives great feedback and even have dedicated Apple keys. Great buy if you're looking for keyboard for your iPad Air
customer_reviews.author: tamar

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some bad changes from prior version
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for general use but not for traveling. The prior one that I needed to replace was a good cover as it folded over the pad and protected it when moving from place to place but it is no longer available. I guess the 'If it isn't broke, don't fix it' idiom wasn't thought of when redesigning. The good change is that the pad can change from landscape to profile view for apps that work that way in the slot. It is magnetized upon close so the face of the pad is covered.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fine iPad
customer_reviews.text: Very good iPad. Dropped it and sat on it and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I like this keyboard a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this keyboard a lot. Because of the extra row of keys at the top that run some iPad functions, the keys you type on are lower on the keyboard, so it took a bit of adjusting to that when I use it on my lap. On a desk, it's fine. But, that being said, the best part about this is how quickly it connects to bluetooth. It's a solid, high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The first Logitech Keyboard I ordered had a battery that wouldn't charge. Got a full refund. Ordered the same model from the same company and this time the Keyboard works great with my IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C. Hadaway Jr

customer_reviews.title: This one is good but not always rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Mounts well. Life changer for traveling with the iPad. Much more productive now with the keyboard. However the previous version for the ipad2 had a more solid grip. This one is good but not always rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great product! 100% reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Love it, this was an attempt to replace a laptop for my wife, and has worked very well so far. It is very light, which was a great concern for my wife, the keys feel good and are great for typing...even better than the ones on my laptop. Feels well made, even luxurious, almost the same color as the back of the Ipad, It really expands the capabilities of an ipad...great product.
customer_reviews.author: PABLO BARRIUSO VILLAMAR

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Protects the iPad when not in use. Keyboard is light and holds a charge for a very long time (many months between charges). Keyboard works like a charm with the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Ultrathin Magnetic Clip-On Keyboard for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for the iPad. The new keyboard offers a tilt feature for a better viewing angle which is new, and great! The downside, and weak point, is going to be the plastic hinge on the back. You cannot open your iPad past 110 degrees before it forcibly disconnects. The keyboard design for the previous generation iPad has metal hinge that swivels 270 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sayson

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed Since this product used to work great!
customer_reviews.text: This my third Logitech cover/keyboard for my iPad Air 2. The first two had batteries die, but I love this product so much I bought another. This model does not hold the iPad Air 2 effectively and it keeps falling out. It is extremely diassapointing. How did the company manage to make their cover/keyboard stop properly holding up the iPad?
customer_reviews.author: Craig Theorin

customer_reviews.title: Great for typing. Looks elegant and stylish. But gives you this sense of ipad's gonna fall or break changing angles.
customer_reviews.text: I don't get how people not like the hinge but it's more stylish how it disappears and merges within the body. I guess style > function for me. So I just bought an ipad sleeve to make myself more comfy. But once the keyboard's out and type your heart out, the hinge for the stand works for landscape, I don't think I'd use it in portrait, if the groove was deeper then yes. But the keys themselves, spacing and elevation, pretty silent compared to anker, I love this product. Wish it's backlit though.
customer_reviews.author: bLeu

customer_reviews.title: A great keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: works excellent. Highly recommend it. Just be careful with this one as if you drop your iPad it could be vulnerable. Does not have the protection as other covers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best display angle but otherwise a very nice keyboard for ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best display angle but otherwise a very nice keyboard for my new iPad. I especially like the fact that the groove now has a magnet in it so it's harder for the iPad to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great portable keyboard that’s durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is simple and easy to use but takes a little getting used to because of the keystroke of a one piece molded plastic construction. Once you get the hang of it, though, it’s one of the most comfortable, compact keyboards you can find for an ipad 9.5 inch.
customer_reviews.author: JBenReads

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Nice keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I really had hope for this keyboard but like so many others, it's a poor design. The iPad keeps falling out with even the slightest of touch or simple vibratioin from typing. The keyboard is nice though with quick response and touch. However, the channel the iPad sits in is just too shallow so it falls out. I returned this for another brand. I wouldn't suggest purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reich

customer_reviews.title: Love the keyboard, but keys pop out with barely 1 month use :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. I take good care of it and even bought a case to protect my ipad/keyboard combo. Then after 2 weeks of use, a key starts popping off the board. O_O.....Really? That was disappointing. Going to see if warranty can be applied to this because I barely used it and a key pops out. A good 4.5 star keyboard just got knocked to a 3. We'll see what happens...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Decided to try a new keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: It would not pair with my iPad for a long time. I kept turning everything off and then on again and after charging the keyboard (which I thought was supposed to be charged) for a few hours, it finally connected. I will write a more extensive review after I've used it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Accessory for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Fits IPad Air like a glove. Able to take screen shots. Keyboard has good feel.
customer_reviews.author: J Unruh,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard pictured is not version I received. I actually received the older version with 5 rows but it works perfectly and fits my ipad air correctly -- thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Kime

customer_reviews.title: This is a great keyboard (that works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard (that works!) and it is indeed slim and minimal in weight and stature. However as far as protecting your ipad from a drop; There is no back protection so I carry it in another case.
customer_reviews.author: HIG

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Works when plugged into power-source, but does not work on battery power.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Griswold

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is wonderful! Easy to use and the battery lasts a ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is wonderful! Easy to use and the battery lasts a long time. It has made studying and writing up reports so much easier for me and is great for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. The only thing is it is hard to get at the power and volume buttons when it is mounted in the case unless you have small fingers or long nails.
customer_reviews.author: Nowhere Man

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: I had a logitech keyboard for my older ipad and loved it. This one is crap. It's plastic and the ipad keeps falling off. Not at all the quality of the previous one. I don't recommend it. I'm sorry I bought it
customer_reviews.author: southbeach diva

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Best clip-on keyboard/case ever! Lightweight, easy to use, stays charged for months.
customer_reviews.author: zoilus girl

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard adds functionality to iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works well with my iPad Air, and gives me a full-keyboard option for travel purposes. When closed it provides protection for the screen. It doesn't stay attached terribly well when closed, but I usually keep it in a sleeve anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Owen McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this, perfect for the iPad Air 2. The magnetic siding flips up, making it easy to slide the ipad right in. No issues so far, recommend buying this plus a soft case for the back, and voila - you have a case that also turns into a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: ensemchall

customer_reviews.title: New Magnet Design is cheap & breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The new design featuring the plastic magnet is flawed mine broke within 5 months. I had one in the original metal magnet and it was fantastic. It lasted for years until I spilled my drink on the keyboard. Will not buy this iteration again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kneebone

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to iPad
customer_reviews.text: Allows my iPad Air 2 to function like an iPad Pro. Very convenient when I do not want to travel with my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: HRJ

customer_reviews.title: I really like the keyboard in general - the only flaw is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the keyboard in general - the only flaw is that the adjustable angle piece becomes loose over time so that the ipad leans back too far and won't stay at a higher angle. This happens with about 6 months of use in my case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pitkow

customer_reviews.title: Magnet does not hold
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard, but the magnet does not stick at all. This was a replacement for one where the magnet bar broke off. This magnet is just not adequate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J

customer_reviews.title: The older style that I formally had (and lost) was MUCH better! I will search to see if the original ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Unhappy with this newer-style Logitech iPad Air keyboard. The magnetic catch did not activate most of the time and broke after a few weeks of use! Had to turn the unit upside-down to get the catch to come out of its storage location, very awkward. The older style that I formally had (and lost) was MUCH better! I will search to see if the original one is still available. Keyboard function was good.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks new. Perfect for typing on the go and looks very slick. Refurbished was a gamble to me, but it paid off!
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard for ipad
customer_reviews.text: Delivered timely & accurately described! Easy to set up & use. Holding up to a middle schooler so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Calm

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this keyboard! I can type easily with it. It is very handy to use with my iPad Air 2. The two angles seem to be enough for me. It protects only the front of my iPad but that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Koepcke

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promise
customer_reviews.text: Well thought of. Keyboard keys very pleasant. Never rely on the magnet when walking with it. Makes your iPad more like a small computer for better productivity when away from a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Matan

customer_reviews.title: Works well with iPad
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is a wee bit cramped, but works well and has turned my iPad into a laptop! Easy to use and set up. Deducted one star because it doesn't really function as a case, but it's fine for basic portability and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the previous model...
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for the way the magnetic strip was designed. I prefer the older model where it had a much better "hold", and was easier to maneuver the iPad attachment - the new model has the magnetic strip laying flat and it is most difficult to raise it. Also, the older model had the iPad at a better angle when placed in the groove.
customer_reviews.author: GEK

customer_reviews.title: I just love having a keyboard and two logitech keyboard folios broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love having a keyboard and two logitech keyboard folios broke - same place so a design problem. This one is not quite as handy but it magnetically clips or can just be set aside if not using the keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Overmeditated

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard doesn't fit my iPad Air properly. The tablet continually falls over, rendering the keyboard useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mlgorut

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. The magnetic latch assembly is a little weird, but it's great for writing emails and instant messaging and finally allows me to leave my Macbook at home when traveling light.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Keyboard broke where the iPad sits on the ledge. I had a previous model for my old iPad and loved it, but this one just didn't work as well. Not only did it break, but the iPad kept slipping out of the ledge and falling while I was using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was not a cover at all like stated in the description of the product. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it except the magnets are really weak
customer_reviews.text: I love Logitech products as it tends to be the only accessory company i trust. Prior to purchasing this keyboard I had high expectations but then i received this product and was slightly disappointed. I love everything about it except the magnets are really weak and i am not sure if i trust my iPad on it. I will give it a shot for a few weeks and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Must have add on!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for me, did not experience any of the issues in some previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: TheGadgetMan

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPad Pro 9.7
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, but doesn't clip to the iPad Pro 9.7
customer_reviews.author: sbs

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and the keyboard is great to type on
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and the keyboard is great to type on. It shows I should be able to set the iPad straight up but cannot figure that out and It is kind of a pain to close. still better than any other keyboards I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my Mom was she LOVES it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Works great, comfortable to use, and easy to carry around! I originally wanted A keyboard that was bigger, however after using this keyboard I realize that the size is perfect and it works really well with my iPad. I've been using it to take notes and I've been really successful. I would highly recommend this if anyone is looking for a keyboard for an iPad as I think that this is got to be the best one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Elysa

customer_reviews.title: An awesome idea... Lasted 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for the first 6 months. Then certain letters on the keyboard quit working. Research shows that this is not an uncommon issue. No effective fix that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Derek_Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Smart stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you can't stand the built-in keyboard on an iPad. It doubles as a case that covers the glass part of the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the back hinge folds down so you do have to pull it back up every time
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Clip-On Keyboard is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this keyboard!!!!! It is soooo much faster to type on my iPad with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchna

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. However, the magnetic clip is not strong enough and it does not cause the ipad to autosleep. In addition would have been much better if the keyboard allowed portrait usage as well as landscape. other than that, very ergonomic, amazing battery life and in general, if you just use your computer for surfing, basic word processing etc. with this keyboard, you can say good bye to your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good key layout and tactile feel
customer_reviews.text: Worked pefectly right out of box with my iPad Air. Good key layout and tactile feel. Fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton P.

customer_reviews.title: I love that the keyboard is thin
customer_reviews.text: I love that the keyboard is thin, lightweight & tilts! Unfortunately the magnetic groove is not strong enough to keep my iPad Air from falling out. I purchased the product in August and the ipad continually falls backward out of the groove -this las time cracking the screen. I preferred the no tilt version as my ipad never fell out.
customer_reviews.author: PartyMom

customer_reviews.title: After receiving the Logitech and taking it out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the Logitech and taking it out of the box, it will not connect to my iPad. When I searched for Logitech support, the tel. # listed on their website was for a travel service. FAIL. Will be returning and will go with a different company. Would suggest NOT purchasing this device.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kratz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for the iPad air
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome. The connectivity to the iPad air is perfect and is never lost. I've been using this keyboard everyday for the past two weeks and haven't had to charge the battery or has it lost connectivity. Overall, this keyboard has exceeded my expectations. A must have for the iPad Air.
customer_reviews.author: JoeB

customer_reviews.title: Works great but....
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I think they could improve it by making the front lip of the cover/keyboard snap shut with the iPad (like on Logitech's older model).
customer_reviews.author: JDRUCK

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the keyboard advertised in the photo. The one you receive is the first generation where the iPad can't tilt.
customer_reviews.author: BruceR

customer_reviews.title: Loser
customer_reviews.text: Say goodbye to your iPad cause it's going to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: lovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: decent worth it so far...
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Works much better than my previous but upright option for iPad does not work. I've had it for less than 2 months but seems to hold a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: dr D

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, not typical of Logitech products. Most are well designed with nice fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Duva

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to replace a keyboard I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a keyboard I have had for several years with broken keys (my fault) but it is not the same size or fit despite being described as a keyboard for the iPad Air. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael in NY City

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 80 year old mother who has no problem with it. Closes nice and easy to set iPad into key pad
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item if you want a normal keyboard. Fits tight one your iPad and makes a cover. Rarely needs charging.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: I've tried at least 4 different keyboards, this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried at least 4 different keyboards, this is the one that I have gone back to multiple times. I've bought 3 of these as mine have worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

product_meta.title: Logitech Ultrathin Magnetic Clip-On Keyboard Cover for iPad Air, Space Gray
product_meta.description: Color:Space gray| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLogitech Ultrathin is a perfect accessory for your iPad. It is thin and light, thanks to its high-grade aluminum construction. A new smart hinge lets you tilt iPad like a laptop screen for a perfect typing angle. An improved layout with well-spaced keys and iOS shortcuts make typing familiar, fast and accurate
feature_bullets: Thin and light keyboard cover for iPad Air: Made of high-grade aluminum and only 6.4mm thick
Great typing: Bluetooth keyboard with familiar layout and iOS shortcuts for fast, accurate typing
Flexible multi-angle stand: Smooth hinge lets you tilt iPad Air to the perfect viewing angle, just like a laptop screen

Note: For power issue - Make sure that you are using an iPad Air (not the Air 2 or iPad mini). The keyboard is only compatible with this device. Make sure that your iPad is powered on. Bluetooth setting is set to on.
If your device still does not power on, leave it on a flat surface with the charger plugged in for three to four hours.
